class_features.name: Improved Critical
class_features.description: Your weapon attacks score a critical hit on a roll of 19 or 20

class_features.name: Unparalleled Athleticism
class_features.description: You can add half your proficiency bonus (round up) to any Strength, Dexterity, or Constitution check you make that doesnâ€™t already use your proficiency bonus. In addition, when you make a running long jump, the distance you can cover increases by a number of feet equal to your Strength modifier.

class_features.name: Master Critical
class_features.description: Whenever you score a critical hit, you deal 3x the damage, instead of 2x.
